meanings.definition: The action of reading or examining something carefully.
meanings.sent1: Her perusal of the book was thorough and detailed.
meanings.sent2: I gave the document a quick perusal before the meeting.
meanings.sent3: During her perusal of the menu, she couldn't decide what to order.
meanings.sent4: His perusal of the contract revealed some hidden clauses.
meanings.sent5: The detective's perusal of the evidence led to a breakthrough in the case.

meanings.definition: The act of looking at or reading something in a casual or relaxed way.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed a leisurely perusal of the magazine at the coffee shop.
meanings.sent2: A quick perusal of the newspaper headlines kept him informed.
meanings.sent3: His perusal of the map led them in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent4: The perusal of the old letters brought back fond memories.
meanings.sent5: The perusal of the painting revealed hidden details.
